mapper.select: SELECT U.NAME , U.USER_ID , U.GENDER , U.PWD , U.EMAIL , U.PHONE , U.REGIST_DATE , U.UNREGIST_DATE , U.AUTHORITY_CODE , B.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE , B.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE2 , C.MENU_CODE REF_MENU_CODE , D.MENU_CODE , D.MENU_NAME , D.MENU_URL , D.MENU_CONTENT , D.MENU_CATEGORY , D.SUPER_MENU_CODE FROM USER U LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY B ON (U.AUTHORITY_CODE = B.AUTHORITY_CODE) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY_MENU C ON (B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) LEFT JOIN MENU D ON (C.MENU_CODE = D.MENU_CODE) WHERE U.USER_ID = #{ userId }
